channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Guardrails, Now More Than Ever
item.description: America’s institutions exist to resist evil, teach virtue, and instill purpose in all of us. Charlie Kirk’s murder commands us to restore them.

item.title: Relax, It Is Never Space Aliens
item.description: There’s enormous media pressure to publish whenever anything alien comes out. Yet the best explanation of the phenomena isn’t aliens.

item.title: Schumer, Jeffries demand meeting with Trump over government shutdown
item.description: Two top Democrats -- Senate Minority Leader Charles E. Schumer and House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries -- wrote a letter to President Trump urging a...

item.title: The ‘Study’ You’re Citing About Right-Wing Violence Is Full Of Fake Data
item.description: An Antifa-connected researcher with rabid bias against the right is held out as an expert on deciding who is extreme.

item.title: Maggie Cleary named acting U.S attorney for Eastern District of Virginia, replacing Erik Siebert
item.description: A conservative lawyer who has said she was falsely accused of being at the U.S. Capitol on Jan. 6, 2021, has been tapped to serve as the top federal p...

item.title: Where Is Congress on Trump’s Lethal Military Strikes on Venezuelan Boats?
item.description: Even assuming he is correct that these are narco-terrorists, Trump has offered no justification under the Constitution and the laws of war.

item.title: Trump demands Venezuela take back criminals, threatens 'incalculable price' if they refuse
item.description: President Trump demanded that Venezuela accept "prisoners and people from mental institutions" that are in the United States.

item.title: WATCH: Susan Ferrechio answers questions about the suspect in the Charlie Kirk assassination

item.title: Independents And Republicans Have To Embrace Political Confrontation In Their Personal Lives
item.description: One of the biggest problems that America has is that there’s a side of the political divide that lives, sleeps, and breathes with their ideology at th...

item.title: Riefenstahl Raises the Riddle of Artistic Heroism
item.description: A timely hit job equates cinema and politics.

item.title: Why The Feds Can’t Trust Utah To Achieve The Death Penalty For Charlie Kirk’s Murderer
item.description: As President Trump vows a full federal investigation, Attorney General Pam Bondi needs to file federal charges that carry the death penalty.

item.title: 118 House Democrats Refuse To Vote For Resolution Condemning Charlie Kirk’s Assassination

item.title: Abolish the FCC
item.description: Rather than fantasizing about using government power to punish the left, Republicans should foreclose the possibility of future suppression.
